TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TaskDialogPage extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示任务对话框的一页内容。

span.span: Represents a page of content of a task dialog.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过调用具有目标实例的方法，可以在显示任务对话框时进行导航 。It is possible to navigate a task dialog while it is shown by invoking the method with a target instance.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AllowCancel { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.AllowCancel : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否可以将 作为结果按钮来通过按 ESC 或 Alt+F4 或单击标题栏的“关闭”按钮关闭任务对话框，即使 按钮未添加到 集合中也是如此。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the task dialog can be closed with as resulting button by pressing ESC or Alt+F4 or by clicking the title bar's close button, even if a button isn't added to the collection.

value.span: 若要允许通过按 ESC 或 Alt + F4 或单击标题栏的 "关闭" 按钮来关闭对话框，则为;否则为 。

span.span: to allow to close the dialog by pressing ESC or Alt+F4 or by clicking the title bar's close button; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以通过添加 其属性设置为的按钮来截获取消对话框，而不显示 "取消" 按钮 `false` 。You can intercept cancellation of the dialog without displaying a "Cancel" button by adding the button that has its property set to `false`.

exception.span: 属性已设置，且此页面实例当前已绑定到任务对话框。

span.span: The property is set and this page instance is currently bound to a task dialog.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在以无模式显示任务对话框时是否可以将其最小化。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the task dialog can be minimized when it is shown modeless.

value.span: 指定可以最小化任务对话框;否则为 。

span.span: to specify that the task dialog can be minimized; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将此属性设置为时 `true` ， 将自动隐含。When setting this property to `true`, is automatically implied.

exception.span: 属性已设置，且此页面实例当前已绑定到任务对话框。

span.span: The property is set and this page instance is currently bound to a task dialog.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property BoundDialog As TaskDialog
public: property System::Windows::Forms::TaskDialog ^ BoundDialog { System::Windows::Forms::TaskDialog ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取此页当前绑定到的 实例。

span.span: Gets the instance which this page is currently bound to.

value.span: 此页绑定到的实例，或者 如果当前未绑定此页，则为。

span.span: The instance which this page is bound to, or if this page is not currently bound.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 显示页面时，将对其进行绑定，这会由事件 和指示 。A page will be bound while it is being displayed, which is indicated by the events and . 页面绑定到任务对话框时，您不能同时使用不同的实例来显示该页实例 。While a page is bound to a task dialog, you cannot show that page instance using a different instance at the same time.

span.span: Gets or sets the collection of push buttons to be shown in this page.

value.span: 要在此页中显示的自定义按钮的集合。

span.span: The collection of custom buttons to be shown in this page.

member this.Caption : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置要在任务对话框的标题栏中显示的文本。

span.span: Gets or sets the text to display in the title bar of the task dialog.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 显示对话框时可以设置此属性。This property can be set while the dialog is shown.

exception.span: 属性已设置，且任务对话框已开始导航到此页面实例，但尚未引发 事件。

span.span: The property is set and the task dialog has started navigating to this page instance, but the event has not been raised yet.

exception.span: - 或 - 该属性是在当前绑定到任务对话框的页面实例上设置的，但该对话框刚刚开始导航到另一个页面。

span.span: - or - The property is set on a page instance that is currently bound to a task dialog, but the dialog has just started navigating to a different page.

summary.span: 在将此实例绑定到任务对话框并且任务对话框已创建由此 实例表示的 GUI 元素之后发生。

span.span: Occurs after this instance is bound to a task dialog and the task dialog has created the GUI elements represented by this instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这将在显示或导航对话框之后发生。This will happen after showing or navigating the dialog. 发生此事件时， 属性将返回 此页绑定到的实例。When this event occurs, the property will return the instance which this page is bound to.

summary.span: 获取或设置任务对话框中的默认按钮。

span.span: Gets or sets the default button in the task dialog.

value.span: 任务对话框中的默认按钮。

span.span: The default button in the task dialog.

summary.span: 在任务对话框即将销毁此 实例所表示的 GUI 元素并且即将从任务对话框中解除绑定时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the task dialog is about to destroy the GUI elements represented by this instance and it is about to be unbound from the task dialog.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 关闭或导航对话框时会发生这种情况。This will happen when closing or navigating the dialog. 此事件发生后， 属性将返回 `null` 。After this event occurs, the property will return `null`.

span.span: Gets or sets the heading (main instruction).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 显示对话框时可以设置此属性。This property can be set while the dialog is shown.

span.span: Occurs when the user presses F1 while the task dialog has focus, or when the user clicks the button.

summary.span: 获取或设置主图标。

span.span: Gets or sets the main icon.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性可在显示对话框时进行设置，但不能在从 (创建的实例之间切换，也不能在 ) 和标准图标实例创建的实例之间切换。This property can be set while the dialog is shown, however, it cannot be switched between instances created from an (or from a handle pointer) and standard icon instances.

exception.span: 属性已设置，且任务对话框已开始导航到此页面实例，但尚未引发 事件。

span.span: The property is set and the task dialog has started navigating to this page instance, but the event has not been raised yet.

span.span: - or - The property is set on a page instance that is currently bound to a task dialog, but the dialog has just started navigating to a different page.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Navigate(class System.Windows.Forms.TaskDialogPage page) cil managed

param.name: page
param.span: 页面实例，其中包含此任务对话框将显示的内容。

span.span: The page instance that contains the contents which this task dialog will display.

summary.span: 显示当前任务对话框中的新内容。

span.span: Shows the new content in the current task dialog.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在导航过程中，对话框将通过指定的及其控件重新创建对话框 `page` ，并取消绑定并销毁当前显示的页面。During the navigation the dialog will recreate the dialog from the specified `page` and its controls, and unbind and destroy the currently shown page. 导航对话框后，不能立即操作此页或其控件 (除了调用 或再次导航对话框) 。You can't manipulate the page or its controls immediately after navigating the dialog (except for calling or navigating the dialog again). 你将需要等待 事件发生，然后才能操作页或其控件。You will need to wait for the event to occur before you can manipulate the page or its controls.

exception.span: 为 。

span.span: is .

exception.span: 页面实例当前未绑定到对话框， 为 。

span.span: The page instance is not currently bound to a dialog, is .

exception.span: - 或 - 此页面实例包含无效配置。

span.span: - or - This page instance contains an invalid configuration.

exception.span: - 或 - 此方法是从当前任务对话框的某个单选按钮的 事件内调用的。

span.span: - or - This method is called from within the event of one of the radio buttons of the current task dialog.

exception.span: - 或 - 任务对话框已关闭。

span.span: - or - The task dialog has already been closed.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示文本和控件是否按从右至左读取的方式显示。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether text and controls are displayed reading right to left.

span.span: to display text and controls reading right to left; to display controls reading left to right.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 请注意，当使用或导航到在其中设置了此标志的任务对话框后 ， 即使在未设置此标志的情况下，也会将后续导航保留到新的中。Note that once a task dialog has been opened with or has navigated to a where this flag is set, it will keep on subsequent navigations to a new even when it doesn't have this flag set.
